ability.name: And For My Next Trick
ability.description: * When Abracadabra's effect triggers, you may choose to, instead: * Take 1 Corruption Point * While there is a card on Abracadabra, you can use _any_ spell as if you had learned it, even if you don't meet the card's requirements.
ability.flavor: All of the knowledge in the world is at your fingertips, if you're willing to pay the price.
